Package filipondiosUtils

Class MatrixUtils

java.lang.Object
filipondiosUtils.MatrixUtils
public class MatrixUtils extends Object
Class that implements several methods that allow two different transformations and operations to matrices.
Version:
27.06.2022
Author:
Filipondios

    • matrixRank

      public int matrixRank(FormattedNumber[][] matrix)
      Method that calculates the rank of a matrix. Inlinear algebra, Range can be defined as: given some matrix A, its the number of vectors (rows or columns) that can't be expressed as a linear combination of its rows or columns.
      Parameters:
      matrix - FormattedNumber matrix.
      Returns:
      Integer number that represents the rank of the matrix.

    • gaussMethod

      public void gaussMethod(FormattedNumber[][] matrix)
      Method that applies the Gauss Method to a matrix. In mathematics, the Gaussian elimination method is known as the row reduction algorithm for solving linear equations systems. It consists of a sequence of operations performed on the corresponding matrix of coefficients. This method is applied to the calculus of matrices rank, ecuation systems resolution, inverse matrices calculus and more.
      Parameters:
      matrix - FormattedNumber matrix.
